metadata.title: MKF Collection USA Tote Crossbody Bag for Women, American Flag Vegan Leather Top-Handle Messenger, Satchel Shoulder bag Purse
features: CASUAL & STYLISH. The Lilian FLAG Tote Bag From MKF collection by Mia K is casual enough for work and shopping, but cute enough for a night out. Choose a color that matches your dress or outfit and take on the day with confidence.

SPACIOUS TOP ZIPPER PURSE. Our large shoulder bags for women have plenty of room and are big enough to fit your cellphone, books, wallet, makeup, and more all inside. Carry the handbag with the handles or with an adjustable/removeable shoulder strap that adjusts to 23” so you wear it comfortably as a cross body purse
Organization on the Go: Interior features a wall zip pocket and two slip pockets. The exterior features one back zip pocket. Measurements: 11.8” W x 9.45” H x 6” D Handle Drop: 6.3”

Premium Quality: From lasting, easy-slide zippers to quality 100% vegan PU leather and luxury soft TC lining that won’t fall apart, our designer crossbody purse bag for women will quickly become your go-to!

SHOP RISK-FREE - We’re confident you’ll love this bag, If you’re not happy with this purchase order comes with a 30-day satisfaction guarantee! If you receive the wrong item or it was damaged, don’t hesitate to let our service team know.
description: Our Lilian carryall is the ultimate tote bag for everyday wear. Rendered in a printed patriotic pattern in a high-quality vegan leather, this one-compartment bag is designed to stow all you need for a busy day.
Do you need a designer handbag that’s stylish and practical?

Tote Bag has a soft structured silhouette with flat base for stability and protective metal feet. Carry it by the smooth top handles or if the mood strikes, attach the adjustable crossbody strap The Lilian Tote Bag is the perfect companion for any outing with the array of organizational features.

designed with high-quality materials and thoughtful storage pockets that are perfect for work, and shopping with several pockets and zippered compartments, fancy gold-tone embellishments. This designer handbag is practical and convenient for moms, or anyone who wants to carry their stuff in a super cute bag.
Enjoy the sleek look of a high-end designer bag at a price that won’t break the bank.
From a casual day to more formal affairs, you’re going to love the effortless sophistication this purse brings to your entire outfit.
